name: Becca Lyria

name: A Forest Adventure
alt: Becca with one eye closed, pushing through some trees in a forest, wearing a purple corset and pants.

name: A Day at the Beach
alt: Becca in a purple bikini, sunbathing on the beach.

name: Princess Becca
alt: Becca in a regal ballgown and tiara, her hair in a bun.

name: Sketch
alt: A quick sketch of Becca with an inquisitive look on her face.

name: Chilling at the Park
alt: Becca wearing a black corset with a mesh shawl and purple shorts, sitting on a ledge.

name: A Wink and a Kiss
alt: Becca winking, lifting one of her pigtails up in her hand.

name: Ready to Fight
alt: Becca with one hand raised, ready to fight.

name: Vitriol
alt: Becca with her arms crossed, giving an annoyed look.

name: Another Day
alt: Becca wearing her typical attire.

name: Dressed Up for Summer
alt: Becca wearing a purple spaghetti strap dress with a wide ruffled skirt.

alt: Becca in a tight fitted strapless dress with a white top and purple skirt.

name: Young Becca
alt: Becca as a young teen, still wearing her typical attire.

name: Sassy Queen
alt: Becca in a purple plunging neckline dress, smoking a cigar.

name: The Royal Ball
alt: Becca in a tight fitted strapless dress with a white top and purple skirt, smoking a cigarette.

name: Feeling Flirty
alt: Becca in a purple dress, on her knees with a flirtatious look.

name: Playful
alt: Becca in her typical dress, with a playful smile on her face.

name: Shining Beauty
alt: Becca in her typically attire, smiling with bubbles behind her.

name: A Night on the Town
alt: Becca in a fancy evening dress with a black bow sash and purple gloves. Her hair is up in a ponytail.
